mapper.select: select a.OPS_TRADE_ID as tradeId, c.MapCode as companyCode, b.mailId, b.orderId from ACOAPP_OMS.Pre_Trade a join iagent.orderhist b on a.Shipment_Id = b.OrderId join ACOAPP_OMS.Company_Map c on b.EntityId = c.CompanyId and b.OrderType = c.OrderType where b.ConfirmExpDt Is Not Null and b.mailid is not null and b.entityid is not null and a.Feedback_Status = '0' and a.Trade_Type = #{orderType}
mapper.update: update ACOAPP_OMS.Pre_Trade a set a.Feedback_Status = case when #{feedbackStatus} = '4' and nvl(a.feedback_retry_count, 0) < 3 then '0' else #{feedbackStatus} end, a.Feedback_Status_Remark = #{feedbackStatusRemark}, a.Feedback_User = #{feedbackUser}, a.Feedback_Date = #{feedbackDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, a.feedback_retry_count = nvl(a.feedback_retry_count, 0) + 1 where a.Ops_Trade_Id =#{tradeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
